about_the_game:
After years of city life, you’ve finally quit your job to chase your true passion — farming. Now, it’s time to turn your dream into reality as you set out to build and work on your own farm!

Plant and harvest

As a beginner farmer, you’ll start small — planting and harvesting your first vegetables and fruits. Be patient and attentive, as each plant needs special care.

As you progress, you'll unlock a wider variety of vegetables and fruits to cultivate, expanding your farm’s potential.

Livestock

No farm is complete without livestock, and Harvest Hills is no exception. Care for your animals to produce goods like eggs, milk, honey, and wool.

Homemade products

As your farm grows, you'll soon have the opportunity to purchase your first homemade products machine. Gather the necessary ingredients and use the machines on your ranch to create a variety of homemade goods, such as tomato sauce, juice, cheese, and more.

Sell your harvested crops and homemade products at the local market to earn money. Use your earnings to upgrade and expand your farm.

Alongside your daily farm duties, complete simple tasks to unlock new farm objects and expand list of products you can cultivate and produce.

Features

  • Grow and harvest dozens of vegetables and fruits.

  • Produce animal products like honey, milk, eggs, and wool.

  • Produce a variety of homemade goods, including cheese, juice, tomato sauce, using your farm's products.

  • Build and organize your farm just the way you love it.

  • Sell vegetables, fruits, and other products at the farmers' market to earn money and expand your farm.

  • Unlock new farm objects as you progress.

  • Immerse yourself in a stunning low-poly world that captivates you for hours of endless play.

After years of city life, you’ve finally quit your job to chase your true passion — farming. Now, it’s time to turn your dream into reality as you set out to build and work on your own farm!

name: Harvest Hills

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX760 | AMD Radeon 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 465 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 | AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 465 MB available space

short_description: Harvest Hills is a charming and relaxing farm simulator that allows you to run your own rancho. Cultivate various crops, take care of animals, and produce homemade products. Sell the goods in the local market to earn money and use it to upgrade or automate the farm.
